review: I tried to find out what it actually is via the web and through the store and I really never got an answer that I could understand.  After reading the different reviews of this not being as good as that, etc. I took the chance and bought it at the Apple Store.  I connected it and I have been successful in watching YouTube and listening to music.  It appears that I have to pay something to watch anything else, to include PBS.  As I can't return it now, I am stuck with it until I replace it with Roku or something else.  Right now it is as good as a paper weight!  Would I buy it again?  NO, would I recommend it? NO, and will I buy another? HELL NO!  You got me once, shame on you, get me twice, shame on me.
